DOC.brief_summary: Before anethetic induction , infuse dexmedetomidine 0.5 mcg/kg 2 minute injection lidocaine 30 mg , propofol infusion use target control infusion ( TCI ) pump . Effect site concentraion propofol start 5 change concentration previous response i-gel insertion method
DOC.brief_title: Effect-site Concentration Propofol I-gel Insertion During Anesthesia Induction With Single-dose Dexmedetomidine
DOC.detailed_description: Before anethetic induction , infuse dexmedetomidine 0.5 mcg/kg 2 minute injection lidocaine 30 mg , propofol infusion use target control infusion ( TCI ) pump . Effect site concentraion propofol start 5 change concentration previous response i-gel insertion method . Failure previous subject define difficulty mouth open , severe nausea couph laryngeal spasm , loss consciousness .
DOC.criteria: ASA PS III , 2060 yr old predict difficulty airway , recent URI , BMI > 30kg/m2 , reactive airway disease
